description: Adversaries may stop services or processes in order to conduct Data Destruction or Data Encrypted for Impact on the data stores of services like Exchange, SQL Server...etc.
name: Disable Important Scheduled Task
query: (process.executable.text:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\/Change* AND process.command_line.text:*\/TN* AND process.command_line.text:*\/disable* AND process.command_line.text:(*Microsoft\\Windows\\SystemRestore\\SR* OR *Microsoft\\Windows\\Windows\ Defender\\* OR *Microsoft\\Windows\\BitLocker* OR *Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsBackup\\* OR *Microsoft\\Windows\\WindowsUpdate\\* OR *Microsoft\\Windows\\UpdateOrchestrator\\* OR *Windows\\ExploitGuard*))
author: frack113
Nasreddine Bencherchali
